meanings.definition: Injured by repeated blows or hard usage.
meanings.sent1: The old, battered car barely made it up the hill.
meanings.sent2: The battered soldier bravely continued fighting despite his injuries.
meanings.sent3: The battered teddy bear looked like it had been in a rough pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt battered after going through a painful breakup.
meanings.sent5: The battered ship struggled to stay afloat in the stormy sea.

meanings.sent1: The battered shoes had holes in the soles from constant walking.
meanings.sent2: The battered book had pages that were falling out from being read so many times.
meanings.sent3: The battered sofa sagged in the middle like a tired old dog.
meanings.sent4: His spirit felt battered after facing numerous challenges at work.
meanings.sent5: The battered path through the forest showed signs of heavy foot traffic.
